DamageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Amphibious
Traits.Content: The Croaker can breathe both air and water.

Traits.Name: Camouflage
Traits.Content: While in a wetland environment, the Croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Croaker makes two attacks with its Tongue Lash.

Actions.Name: Tongue Lash
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet closer to the Croaker.

Actions.Name: Bitter Croak
Actions.Content: The Croaker emits a loud croak. Each creature within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 8 (2d6) thunder damage and be deafened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Leap Attack
Actions.Content: The Croaker jumps up to 20 feet to land on a target. Melee Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage on a hit and knocking the target prone if it is Medium or smaller.
